import React, { useState } from 'react'; type TaskState = { title: string; description:string; date:string|null } enum Slug { TITLE = 'title', DESCRIPTION = 'description',DATE = 'date' } const AddTask = (props:any) =>{ const [state,setState] = useState({ title:'', description:'', date: null, }) const handleOnchage = (value:string, slug: Slug) => { setState((current:any) => ({...current,[slug] :value})) } const currentDate = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; return ( <>

New Task

handleOnchage(e.target.value,Slug.TITLE)} />
